title: Pixel 2 xl no signal/can't connect to cellular network.
content: I brought my phone from Canada last year and its been working fine then i broke the screen (it still worked fine) sent it back to Canada to get fixed but when i got it back it wont connect to the network and if it does it only lasts for a few seconds and can only use the networks data. I live in NZ. Have done factory resets/safe mode.
